title: Mundi unisex-adult Socially Sure Kit Mask No Touch Tool and Filter Set
features: Each Socially Sure Kit includes: 2 Face masks, a no touch door opener keychain, 2 replaceable carbon filters and a clear wristlet bag. Not For Medical Use.
2 reusable and washable fashion face masks with adjustable metal molding around the nose, built in filter pocket and adjustable ear strap
All day comfort with adjustable ear loops so you can make this face covering bigger or smaller for additional comfort for all day use
Each kit includes a No-Touch Tool (Non Contact Door Opener) that is perfect for opening doors and pressing buttons of shared surfaces, such as door handles, elevator buttons, ATM’s, Keypads and more
Each everyday mask has a space for a filter to be placed inside the mask providing additional protection
description: Our Socially Sure Kit with Face Masks allows you to be safe and healthy throughout your day. Two fabric face masks, a Don’t Touch That multi-purpose touch tool and two replacement Carbon Filters for you mask. These masks also have adjustable metal molding around the nose for a better fit. If you feel the need to change your filter in your mask you can easily do so with one of the 2 extra filters in this kit. Along with the masks, the multi-purpose touch tool allows you to keep your hands off of the dirty surfaces you encounter every day. Whether it be a door handle or ATM machine our touch tool keeps your hands clean and body safe from any germs on public surfaces.
